entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cache Creek

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:07 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:07 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers except snow over higher terrain overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:07 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
